text_block_list.text: Registration for Dorowa is over here! Please only enter the hall once you've checked off your name on the registe— ah…!
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Good evening, Nature-san!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Woah, Chiyo-chan's dress is adorbs! What's up with this? Oh, a sakura motif?!
text_block_list.name: Chiyono O's Friend A

text_block_list.text:
Yup. Sakura. 
Sakura that spent its days alongside light snowfall.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
…Chiyono O-san sure is popular. 
But… hehe. You're her number one, aren't you, Ardan-san?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Yes. "Right now", that is.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: But, I understand that the one who will spend her life pursuing her isn't me.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: …Huh?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: That's why I won't forget this night.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Even if throughout our lives we find that we were not eachother's number one, for just this one special night, we were able to become eachother's irreplaceable partners.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Tonight, just for this very moment, with our arms intertwined, the one reflected in her eyes will be me. And the one reflected in my eyes will be her.… I won't let anyone take that away from me.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: …Even if that "number one" were to show up in front of your very eyes?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Exactly, Nature-san.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: I'm sure you, too, have someone whose gaze you want all to yourself.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Oh, wow… did you see Teio and McQueen just now?! They're seriously on another level.
text_block_list.name: Attending Umamusume A

text_block_list.text: I know, right? They're definitely gonna be tonight's Best Date! As for us, well… how about we just take it slow for now?
text_block_list.name: Attending Umamusume B

text_block_list.text: Let us proceed to the dance floor, too.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Okay. Also… Ardan-san!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Please don't hold yourself back anymore.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: I learned with my body how good you are at dancing. And now, I've made myself remember how you dance.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Even if you decide to adlib some steps, I'll follow right along. Don't feel like you have to match my rhythm. You should dance like you.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: We're going to go out there as Sakura Chiyono O and Mejiro Ardan. And we're gonna dance together!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Then, without further ado…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Look at me, Chiyono O-san.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Of course, Ardan-san.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
